successes.title: Battle Systems™ Sci-fi Modular Terrain
successes.description: Sci-fi terrain for 28mm tabletop games. This is pre-punched card that is easy to assemble with no cutting, painting or gluing required.

Pledges.description: Yes it's the reward of our THANKS. We cannot stress our gratitude enough. You are helping us develop a new way to play games, inside of awesome buildings and structures. We thank you from the bottom of our hearts.

Approx $48 USD. OUTPOST - (small single level set) Enough components to make the interior of a small structure. 4 Floor tiles * 12 Walls * 4 Doorway walls + 4 Blast doors * 5 Cargo crates * 3 V-consoles * 8 Struts + 4 Buttresses * 4 Chairs * 1 Transfer conduit * 1 Command screen * 1 Clone chamber * 15+ Acrylic clips. OUTPOST DOES NOT INCLUDE STRETCH GOALS.
Please add £5 shipping to the UK.

Approx $72 USD. STATION - (single level set) Enough components to make the interior of a larger structure. 9 Floor tiles * 21 Walls * 8 Doorway walls + 8 Blast doors * 10 Cargo crates * 6 V-consoles * 18 Struts + 9 Buttresses * 9 Chairs * 2 Transfer conduit * 2 Command screens * 2 Clone chamber * 30 Acrylic clips * 17 additional ramps. STATION DOES NOT INCLUDE STRETCH GOALS. 
Please add £7 shipping to the UK.

Approx $103 USD. STRONGHOLD EARLY BIRD + Stretch Goals Start Here!
9 Floor tiles + 2 small Floor tiles * 30 Walls * 12 Doorway walls + 12 blast doors * 10 Cargo crates * 6 V-consoles * 18 struts + 9 buttresses * 9 Chairs * 3 Transfer conduits * 2 Command screens * 2 Clone chambers * 18 Gantries (various shapes) * 24 Large Railings * 21 Small Railings * 18 pairs of wall converters * 15 spotlights * 6 stairs (small and large sizes)  * 34 additional ramps * 70+ Acrylic clips * 1 Turbine * 1 Battle Table * 1 Hangar Bay * All free stretch goals! 
Please add £8 shipping to the UK.

Approx $108 USD. STRONGHOLD EARLY BIRD 2 + Stretch Goals Start Here! 9 Floor tiles + 2 small Floor tiles * 30 Walls * 12 Doorway walls + 12 blast doors * 10 Cargo crates * 6 V-consoles * 18 struts + 9 buttresses * 9 Chairs * 3 Transfer conduits * 2 Command screens * 2 Clone chambers * 18 Gantries (various shapes) * 24 Large Railings * 21 Small Railings * 18 pairs of wall converters * 15 spotlights * 6 stairs (small and large sizes) * 34 additional ramps * 70+ Acrylic clips* 1 Turbine * 1 Battle Table * 1 Hangar Bay * All free stretch goals!
Please add £8 shipping to the UK.

Approx $113 USD. STRONGHOLD. This is our SWEET SPOT + Stretch Goals Start Here! 9 Floor tiles + 2 small Floor tiles * 30 Walls * 12 Doorway walls + 12 blast doors * 10 Cargo crates * 6 V-consoles * 18 struts + 9 buttresses * 9 Chairs * 3 Transfer conduits * 2 Command screens * 2 Clone chambers * 18 Gantries (various shapes) * 24 Large Railings * 21 Small Railings * 18 pairs of wall converters * 15 spotlights * 6 stairs (small and large sizes) * 34 additional ramps * 70+ Acrylic clips * 1 Turbine * 1 Battle Table * 1 Hangar Bay * All free stretch goals! Please add £8 shipping to the UK.

Approx $205 USD. STRONGHOLD x2 EARLY BIRD plus all free stretch goals x2.
Enough components to build a 2 foot x 4 foot battle area plus the ability to build up too, as the stronghold sets are multi level. BIG BATTLES. Please add £15 shipping to the UK.

Create an entire mega complex for COLOSSAL BATTLES AND CAMPAIGNS. Please add £30 shipping to the UK.
You get a copy of our Stronghold set, signed by us, plus all free stretch goals.
